title: What does LT mean?
content:
A font is called Adobe Garamond Regular LT …  
What does LT mean? Linotype?  
Is Adobe Garamond Regular LT identical to another font I might possess?

—  
Soren O
author: soren_o

comments.content: If this font has lithuanian diacritics (ogoneks) and it is not unicode, LT can stand for modified font.

Light - Linotype - Lurie-Terrell - Lithuanian …

Can I just choose freely from the above?

—  
Soren O

Kidding aside … anybody know the right answer? … plus, what is specific about Adobe Garamond LT. I mean, is it unique or is it identical to some other font?

—  
Soren O
I believe that in this instance, it refers to the version of the Adobe Garamond font distributed by Linotype.
